cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 21st Nov 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 21st Nov 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Standard 6 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: A single pod in a mixed 6 bed dorm. There is an ensuite toilet.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Deluxe 4 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: A Queen pod in a mixed dorm. Kitchenette that contains a fridge & microwave, small dining area & private deck. There are no bathroom facilities inside the room, there are shared facilities down the hall. Queen Pod listings are single occupancy and cannot
